website_summaries.verdict: A great product if you're looking for something that's going to give you a massive energy boost before your workout.
pros: Leaves you feeling energized without making you jittery
Mixes well without becoming gritty or clumping
Begins working in as little as 15 minutes
cons: Can make you sick if taken on an empty stomach

customer_reviews.title: Way too much food coloring
customer_reviews.text: I always drink my pre-workout on my way to work. I workout prior to starting my shift. I walk in the weight room and a coworker says, "Why are your lips blue?" I didn't think much of it until I looked in the mirror. Legit, my lips were blue, my teeth were blue, and my tongue was blue. I looked like I just walked out of Charley's Chocolate factory. Ridiculous. I under stand these companies add flavor and coloring. I have used many different brands over the years and have never had this issue. It was the first time I used C4, so not sure if I had a overloaded batch or what.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product came in and I immediately noticed the color was different and the scooper was noticeably bigger than the c4 I’ve been buying for GNC for years. The taste is very different a lot more sour than the real blue razz. I thought I would give it a chance so I tried it, and it did not have any effect do not waste your money on the product it is obviously a fake!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Came clumped up?
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years, and the first time I bought it on Amazon was the worst product I've gotten. It was hard! Not powdery. I'm still using it because I don't want it to go to waste. What I do is scratch it off every morning and put 2 small clumps in my water before my work out. Still works like the product should. But weirded out that it's clumped.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Luz

customer_reviews.title: Hardened up after a month though tightly sealed. Something changed.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this brand for years, but as others have stated, somethings changed. Within a month, my top loose powder was used up to reveal the rest is hardened like moisture got to it. Doesn’t have the same purpose when over half of the container is a hard brick of powder. I had planned on buying the larger container and I’m glad I didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: manda

customer_reviews.title: Tastes bad
customer_reviews.text: We had the C4 sport on subscription and it was no longer available so we added this one thinking it was the same. It’s not, it has a weird bitter taste to it and was hard to drink. Won’t be ordering this again!
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Jones

customer_reviews.title: Seal was opened. Unsafe.
customer_reviews.text: Product came with seal open, completely open and it was spilled everywhere. Horrible!! Not eligible for return either! Never again Cellucor you lost a life Lon customer.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Archer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good now that it changed.
customer_reviews.text: They’ve changed ingredients as far as coloring of the powder and flavor. Icy Blue Raz is now a white powder that turns blue when added to water. I’m not a fan of the new mix. To me it taste bad and doesn’t seem the same. Been using C4 for years and gonna start looking into other brands unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: joseph allen

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite pre workout drinks
customer_reviews.text: C4 is the pre workout drink drink that I always come back to. The blue raspberry is my favorite flavor. It has creatine, beta alanine, caffeine and other vitamins. It gives you that kickstart to attack your workout especially on those days that you don’t feel like working out. Just mix with water and you will start feeling it minutes after drinking. I try many different pre workout drinks and like to mix it up so my body does not get used to one and C4 is one I always rotate in. It’s also made by a leader in the fitness supplement company that has been in business for years
customer_reviews.author: John DTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Makes you mouth turn BLUE!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it turn your mouth blue, but I’m not satisfied with the product overall, not much effect for a preworkout.....
customer_reviews.author: Josie Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Don't order...product went bad after a couple of weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would try out a new supplement. It worked fine, however it got rock hard after about 2 weeks and I was unable to scoop the powder. I made sure to dry my hands before grabbing the scoop every time. The moisture pack was also left in the tub, but it did nothing. Now I'm left with half a tub that I can't even use...
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Coons

customer_reviews.title: The first time it was great. The 2nd time
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product 3 times now. The first time it was great. The 2nd time, the power kept clumping in the container. The lid was sealed tightly after using and the dehydrating pack was left in the container. I thought it was possibly just a defective container so I threw it away and ordered another one. The same thing happened with the third order.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Where did my C4 go?
customer_reviews.text: It makes me sad to write this review. I have used C4 for years and loved the taste and the tingle. This new formula tastes terrible. It is not at all like the other one. The color is different package is a lot smaller and the tingle doesn’t hit at the fast pace it used to. Give me the old stuff that crumbles any day. PS if you have the stuff that has become lumpy, mix it with about two Tbsp of boiling water and then add the rest of your water. Bring back my old C4!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Aley

customer_reviews.title: Works!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I am not a extreme gym nut !! but I was lacking a little bit of energy/aggression/motivation in my early morning work out routine !! and also even after getting a solid 8 or 9 hours sleep the night before when i wake up at 6 and go to gym !! i found myself yawning while lifting !! my body was not in the mood !! C4 was my fix !! now I go and rip it in the gym !! keeps me in the gym mood!!
customer_reviews.author: Max Naidu

customer_reviews.title: My favorite preworkout
customer_reviews.text: Favorite preworkout! Such a classic - I love this flavor too. My favorite and easy to down before my workouts and kicks in about 20 minutes later too. At first you’ll feel like “itchy skin” kinda thing going on but eventually you don’t feel that anymore within time. Or maybe that’s just me... idk. Recommend!! Been using this for YEARS.
customer_reviews.author: Alexbethany

customer_reviews.title: SO GROSS
customer_reviews.text: I typically use this pre-workout before exercising and up until now, I had only tried the pink lemonade flavor and liked it a lot. I decided to give the blue razz flavor a try and it makes me want to gag. It is so thick, turns everything blue (tongue, fingers, etc.) and I'm not sure whether it is just so sweet, but it makes me feel kind of sick after drinking it. I am not new to the pre-workout drink world, I have been using it to supplement my workouts for a while now. I think it may be a flavor thing? Never the less, the customer service is always amazing and they helped me with this issue.
customer_reviews.author: wallsm14

customer_reviews.title: C4 ORIGINIAL
customer_reviews.text: Started using C4 Original about ten years. A guy I lifted with who worked for GNC. Informed me the FDA had it removed from the market at one point. That's when I tried ones that were replacing it. I was not happy with. This has been the the most power enhancer. Since we were trying Methen Dreal Dipropinate, Ecoapose and Winstral for horses it promised me "a shiny coat"! Since the baning we had to have it all the more! I'm 63, 162 and have health issues. Yet still l doing 6 sets of preacher curls with 55 dumbbells. Don't pass this product by at any age! Also Met Rx has a comparable as well.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product but price is high
customer_reviews.text: C4 is still our go-to preworkout. However, since Costco quit carrying the 90 servings for $40, we struggle to find it for anywhere close to that price point. It is my personal opinion that there are many flavors better than the Icy Blue Razz, not to mention they are far less staining to your teeth and lips. Nonetheless, without any promotions at Vitamin Shoppe or several other retailers, this is about as cheap as you can find it anymore on a per serving basis.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Product itself is great. I don't personally like the flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Out of all of the C4 pre-workout line, this might be the worst flavor. Of course, it's all preference and might taste really good to someone else. But it gives this really tangy and sour-ish after taste especially if you don't wash it down with a lot of water. The other flavors in my opinion don't do this. Other than this, it's a great product for the desired effects!
customer_reviews.author: Chris E.

customer_reviews.title: A lot of them were good, but this is one of the best one ...
customer_reviews.text: Hey everyone! I think this product is definitely phenomenal. It delivered what it promised to deliver. I have been taking pre work outs before, tried different brands. A lot of them were good, but this is one of the best one is you are new to the world of pre workout. It has helped me push through the toughest work outs and put in my best effort. As I said earlier, if you are new, try this brand and this flavor for sure. Take it 30 minutes before you work out. You will feel a tingly effect but that means it is working! I hope you enjoy this just as much as I am.
customer_reviews.author: Langston Menezes

customer_reviews.title: I liked this preworkout as a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I liked this preworkout as a beginner. It helped get me ready for the gym and the flavor is great. I like how it’s just a little tart and not as sweet as others. However towards the end of the container it starts to harden up into chunks and I’m not sure why. I would occasionally have to take two scoops if it was a long day and without other caffeine in my system.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Really great buzz, terrific flavor, good ingredient mix
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few energy powders and this one is super tasty, sufficiently powerful, and very convenient. A big plus is that the container is small so it doesn't take up your whole cabinet. You can also travel with it easily. The niacin gives a nice face flush and the energy feels sustained rather than racy. Good for an exercise session, or even a busy workday. I find my productivity and focus increases for whatever I'm doing.
customer_reviews.author: jorlowitz

customer_reviews.title: Pump goes away quickly , okay quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the most basic trusty pre workout you can buy I believe. It works pretty well. Unfortunately the "pump" lasts for a short time and it is kind of a weak supplement. I got anxiety after taking the powder but that's just me personally with any caffeine stimulated drink. If you are new at taking pre workout, I do not know if this is for you. It is okay quality but not that good. I recommend buying the more updated version. Trust me it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: It's the right pre-workout for me
customer_reviews.text: I like using this stuff before upper body workouts. It doesn't have too much caffeine but it's enough to get you energized for a workout and keep you going. It also tastes fine. My only concerns are the use of sucralose (artificial sweetener) and becoming dependent on it for every workout, so I try not to use it more than 2-3 times per week. 5 stars though because it works well and has given me real results.
customer_reviews.author: Ashram

customer_reviews.title: 100% counterfeit. DO NOT GAMBLE
customer_reviews.text: This product is 100% a counterfeit. I knew it would be a gamble considering the reviews. I have used authentic C4 pre-workout multiple times and every time I experience extra energy during a work out. With this product I felt nothing and had a significant artificial sweetener taste left on my tongue. On the C4 website Icy blue razz powder is supposed to be white whereas this powder is clearly blue. Do not bother.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine...but why is it so blue?
customer_reviews.text: Legend has it the oceans were clear until a tub of icy blue razz spilled from a shipping vessel. The stuff works as you'd expect for a cheaper, lower caffeine preworkout. There isn't a lot of pump but decent energy. But seriously.....the amount of blue dye is incredible. Stains your mouth, teeth, assuming all internal organs, and "waste" intensely blue (green on the latter).
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: Tasty -- AND GOOD FOR INTERMITTENT FASTING
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the only zero calorie pre-workout drinks I could find, which is important because I practice intermittent fasting and didn't want a morning drink to break my fast. I tried the ICY Blue Razz and love it. Sweet but tart. Gives me a nice buzz before a workout. I'm looking forward to trying other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Add more workout to your workout
customer_reviews.text: First off this stuff tastes great for a powder. Its like blue raspberry pop rocks candy, yum. So I like that. Then you add the extra intensity it gives you while you are working out and the mental focus.....stuff is fanfriggintastic. I exercise longer, challenge myself further, and enjoy my gym time a lot more with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Boden

customer_reviews.title: Great workout product
customer_reviews.text: We love this product. We drink it right before we leave for the gym or on the way. We are about 10 minutes away. Arrived safely packaged and powder great. The flavor is good. I am not a big blue raspberry or blue anything fan, but I was surprised this tastes so good. It will leave your mouth blue. Either be ready to brush your teeth afterwards or chew a piece of gum.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy D.

customer_reviews.title: Works OK
customer_reviews.text: This well known pre-workout drink works OK, but not great. And for some reason, tolerance to its effects seems to set in faster for me than for others I use. It is relatively expensive compared to other pre-workout drinks as well. I've tried many different brands and formulas - bottom line is that there are many that work better and at a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle M. Back

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Pre-Workout Drink
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several different brands of pre-workout drinks, including other products from this same company, and I can honestly say that C4 is my favorite. First of all, it burns clean, so I don't get that crash feeling after it burns up. In addition, the Blue Razz flavor is delicious!
customer_reviews.author: G.G.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love C4 products!!! When I use the powder, I only need half of a scoop to get a good buzz for my workout. I love the Icy Blue Razz and the Bombsicle. Best flavors!! I drink 30 minutes before my workout, then it kicks in at just the right time to keep me buzzed and cruising through my workout with no crash.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle West

customer_reviews.title: Seems Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product in the past, and it's really got me ready for a workout. I didn't even have to use a full scoop. This one I bought on Amazon seems fake. I feel NO CHANGE at all. Literally no amp, no pep. I will never buy this product on Amazon again. The old saying goes, "You get what you pay for"
customer_reviews.author: Nydia

customer_reviews.title: Same great taste, same great pump.
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is great, as always. Pumps are great, as always. If youre the type to be upset over the tingles and slight itchies then this is not for you. I love this stuff and will continue to buy it over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: I’m not sure if this is same product
customer_reviews.text: This item I got taste different from my previous icy blue razz orders, didn’t feel the same and no tingly feeling, scoop is bigger and wider ,didn’t provide any boost in energy, c4 people I don’t know what changed???
customer_reviews.author: Silverback23

customer_reviews.title: Dramatic difference in quality
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this before and it was fine. Apparently they changed the recipe because the color is white instead of blue and the taste is different. It makes me feel worse and sometimes there is a horrible aftertaste. Unless I just got a bad container, I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: morteum

customer_reviews.title: Super sweet and thick.
customer_reviews.text: It tastes good and does what it says it will. Gives a boost of energy and helps you work out longer and harder it might be me but I think it makes me sweat more too. It is very sweet and thick if mixed as directed. I usually use 1 scoop for a 16 oz water bottle the recomendé water I think is 6 or 8 oz but it is far too sweet and thick for me like that.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I gave four stars for a flavor and value the flavor is great the values even better I did not rate the comfortness I don't think this is something that could be rated for comfort
customer_reviews.author: RjB

customer_reviews.title: I Look Like the Wizard that Stole Daenerys Targaryen's Dragons
customer_reviews.text: Blue raspberry tastes alright.. still gives the finger tingles like the other flavors. You have to drink it with a straw to avoid looking like a grubby five year old, and you'll have bright green poo. Other than that, aight.
customer_reviews.author: Seraph

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works great as a prework out
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great as a prework out. I think it has a good amount of caffeine if you have a tolerance built up. If you are new to caffeine or drink 10 cups of coffee a day, then this might not fit but it has a good kick and the pump is noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: Good for those sensitive to caffeine
customer_reviews.text: Its not great but not bad either. There are better products out there that have more stims, but this has the right amount for those who cant handle 400mg of caffeine like the more hardcore pre workouts have and that is honestly a good thing since too much caffeine actually restricts blood flow as a vasoconstrictor.
customer_reviews.author: MZX

customer_reviews.title: Cautious with amount taken
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pre-workout formula. I'm new to current exercising routine, however I like working out in the early morning before starting my day and it gets me the energy needed without hurting myself. I typically have long days of 12-16 hours worth of school/work/homework that I supplement it for all my other caffeine intake and instead just drink lots of water! Be careful taking a lot though, I've had friends who've used it and come in with shaky hands and have a hard time sitting still! Don't take it unless you're going to legit workout, cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: The boost I needed to get off the couch and to the gym
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is good. I didn’t do much research on costs etc. it definitely helps give me the boost I need to get off the couch and make it to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Poor energy, Overly sweet, clumps quickly
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to try c4 since I had heard positive things about the prior formula. my usual pre workout is gold standard, i felt it was affecting me a bit less so i decided to mix up pre-workout. C4 gave me almost no energy, the flavor of the blue razz was very synthetic tasting and way to sweet. perhaps the other flavors and blends are better, but i will not be buying any additional c4 for now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I dont know what changed
customer_reviews.text: I dont know if they changed things up, or are just skimping on some of the ingredients. I went back to C4 after a few months of not using it and it just doesnt have that same giddy up.
customer_reviews.author: AnHonestReview

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Great product at great price. But as with some supplement products from Amazon, it can be a little clumpy. Overall satisfied with quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: MuscleTooth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is A-MA-ZING! It doesn't taste great, but it definitely works! It made me feel so much more energized for my run than I normally do. I definitely felt a significant difference! Now that I've tried it, I can't go back.
customer_reviews.author: jms314

customer_reviews.title: Taste pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for prework out powder that actually taste good and my trainer recommended this. This actually tastes pretty good despite a bit thick.
customer_reviews.author: ivan raintung || lina

customer_reviews.title: Good pump, not best ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I've tried plenty of pre workouts. This one is okay, makes you a bit itchy, but overall a good pump. Ingredients are okay, not the ingredient that causes the itching.
customer_reviews.author: SamBour

customer_reviews.title: my favorite and blueberry and watermelon are the
customer_reviews.text: Been using C4 for years, my favorite and blueberry and watermelon are the best
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Best, affordable pre-workout on the market.
customer_reviews.text: This pre-workout, has been the most effective out of more than a dozen other pre-workouts I have used, throughout the years. I use about 1/2 scoop, and am able to complete at least 15-20% of my workout. There is no 'crash' for me. It can be a little intensive if I use more than 1/2 scoop, but I am sensitive to caffeine and other stimulants.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this flavor. I think fruit punch is still my fave but overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Avinash Patel

customer_reviews.title: It made me feel terrible and sick.
customer_reviews.text: I started feeling extremely sluggish and no energy or motivation. I could not figure out what was going on. I saw a video stating it could be this products since it did the same to that person. I stopped taking it and started feeling myself again. I threw it away, NEVER to take it again.
customer_reviews.author: Myriam

customer_reviews.title: great stuff for new users
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the blue razz flavor, doesn't taste odd nor does it linger during workout. I tend to only use about half the recommended amount. It has been plenty of a boost for an one hour workout; any longer of a routine i'll take a break a drink another half.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Lopez

customer_reviews.title: gets you pumped up
customer_reviews.text: take some of this and get ready to work out or give whatever it is you're about to do your all. pumping iron, chores, building a house, if you need to perform this is your stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Zack

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great pre workout to get you going for those hard days! Taste yummy too!
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: Let's be real it's a little expensive but man does it work. If you have never taken it before I suggest starting with a half scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Lula May

customer_reviews.title: Hits hard and tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. No complaints at all other than it has a bit more beta alanine tab you might want. The pre workout itches are REAL with this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good taste, good bust of energy, some days I feel the tingles....
customer_reviews.author: Cecee

customer_reviews.title: Strong stuff
customer_reviews.text: It’s alright I use about half a scoop and it works I’m 200lb
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Blue mouth!
customer_reviews.text: Refund please? I got this for my sister and her mouth is so blue. I use this same flavor daily and have never experience this. Honestly she looks ridiculous. Different ingredients??
customer_reviews.author: Sommer Winters

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, better performance
customer_reviews.text: The C4 gives an instant energy boost that lasts for hours. The creatine in the powder sculpts your muscles. The icy blue flavor is great but make sure to mix well before drinken. Overall great product espically for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Dolmanet

customer_reviews.title: Works with a few side effects..
customer_reviews.text: May cause anxiety and stomach aches but the stuff works well..
customer_reviews.author: Mike V

customer_reviews.title: Stained my mouth.
customer_reviews.text: This preworkout tastes fine, but stains your entire mouth bright blue. I wouldn’t recommend this flavor. Even when I was pouring my scoop into my shaker, I went to rinse the preworkout that had gotten on my fingers and it stained my skin. Go with the pink lemonade or any other flavor aside from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: IT MAKES ME ITCH
customer_reviews.text: Only giving two stars because although I love the taste and the pump it gives me, it makes me so freaking itchy.... I’ve never experienced that with a preworkout before and it’s a little discouraging...
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Jean

customer_reviews.title: It tastes like I'm drinking a chemical
customer_reviews.text: The new blue raspberry flavour is just gross. It tastes like I'm drinking a chemical.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great Pre-Workout Supplement
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this pre-workout over my previous one. Really gave me the boost I needed for workouts. Strawberry Margarita flavor is my favorite so far,
customer_reviews.author: Hockeydad3

customer_reviews.title: Great value and gives you wings
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff , I have substituted it for my coffee many mornings and gives me added jump in my workouts. Don’t know what it was like without it .
customer_reviews.author: PAPA VAN

customer_reviews.title: I stopped using it
customer_reviews.text: It gave me some pimples for some reason and I stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: Enes

customer_reviews.title: only preworkout that doesn't give me jitters
customer_reviews.text: i love it. will buy again. Well packaged and great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod H.

customer_reviews.title: Different product
customer_reviews.text: I regularly buy this product and I can immediately tell it’s not the same one that you can and Should buy in store. Costco usually sells them for a good price
customer_reviews.author: Christopher O.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor of the icy blue razz. The product works great! I use almost a full scoop before working out and get the perfect boost to my workouts. I have been using this for well over a month and a half and still haven't ran out of the 30 servings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste!
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about this pre-workout but I have to say it blew me out of the water it makes you feel energized and more focused, plus it just tastes downright amazing. Gives a nice tingle when you use it and helps boost workout performance, Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Leitch

customer_reviews.text: This is my first prework out and I really like it. The flavor is pretty nice until you get to the bottom but that’s normal for most powder drinks. It kicks in a bit into my cardio and my arms get all tingly. My face starts to hurt sometimes but it’s never caused any skin issues.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Ngo

customer_reviews.title: Great but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! It works great. But I docked a star because it’s insanely pricey. Please lower the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Changes the game for working out!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t enjoy working out naturally. It takes a lot for me to get to the gym and put in a good workout. C4 has really changed the game for me! It gives me the energy I need to get there and get in a good workout. It also helps me to over perform once I am in the workouts! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jon Paolino

customer_reviews.title: Sand-like particles
customer_reviews.text: My first bad experience with C4 and what a bad experience indeed. Every scoop leaves a residual mix at the bottom that is loaded with particles of PWO that has nothing short of sandy consistency. Very skeptical of the quality of C4 these days, will def not recommend or use in the future. Sad
customer_reviews.author: Neel

customer_reviews.title: Rock hard
customer_reviews.text: Just received the icy blue razz and I was very disappointed when I opened it. The blue part was all clumpy and the rest of the white underneath was rock hard. Not useable at all. Like moisture melted it all together. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Chris blees

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is disgusting and the color sticks everywhere, you can’t clean the shaker anymore, it turned blue
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Cellucor C4 Review
customer_reviews.text: This product works like it says it does. After taking it you start to get a tingling feeling in your hands and throughout your body, but I can definitely tell the difference when I'm working out and can feel it in my muscles. I'm hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Mowrer

customer_reviews.title: Turns your mouth blue
customer_reviews.text: So I have used other C-4 products and the other flavors have not stained my mouth. This flavor turns my lips, teeth and tongue blue. It looks like I ate a smurf after taking this. I tried drinking it with a straw and still has the same effect on me.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Prepare ahead of time
customer_reviews.text: So i didnt eat for like 8 hours before taking this stuff so maybe thats why im having problems but like an hour after taking it i had really bad... bowel movements and out of nowhere from 0 to 10 so beware.. but at least i had the energy to run to the BR
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I mean
customer_reviews.text: It tastes good, but I feel like I get a better effect from Neurocore Pre workout.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Love the C4
customer_reviews.text: Love the C4, I use this supplement when I drive home from work, so I can hit my gym right when I get home. Tingle factor is not intense, but I feel it ( it's expected with this type of pre-workout.) the blue raz taste great. Would recommend for someone who works out frequently
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: It's OK for a basic pre-workout supplement
customer_reviews.text: It's OK for a basic pre-workout supplement, but it lacks many of the ingredients that make brands like OldSchoolLabs stand apart.
customer_reviews.author: Kons

customer_reviews.title: Works if its your last option.
customer_reviews.text: Low pump and a lot of tingling. Not terrible but a lot of better options. That being said cellucor in general is an awesome company but this is their budget stuff
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: C4 is a great pre-workout that gives you that boost before liffting!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's not the best but for the price it's good enough. A scoop and a half you get a good pump without getting very hot or sweaty
customer_reviews.author: JESUS GONZALEZ

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good
customer_reviews.text: I have another preworkout I use and love, but sometimes I need a lil extra kick on certain days. Works great and taste great. No issues with the one I got.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: The Goods.
customer_reviews.text: Got half-way to the gym and realized I forgot my car. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: I don't crash like I would with an energy drink
customer_reviews.text: This was my first preworkout. I don't crash like I would with an energy drink, and I don't get weird side effects if I take this and wait too long to workout
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: It’s tingly but awesome
customer_reviews.text: This pre-workout works for me! After sitting behind a desk all day, I need the boost for my workout. C4 gives me a that. It does affect my sleep at night, but I deal with it for a great workout.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Long

customer_reviews.title: TOO MUCH BLUE
customer_reviews.text: Previously I got the fruit punch flavor and everything was good so I switched it to Blue Razz on my refill and the amount of blue coloring is ridiculous. It get on your fingers and stains my cups, not to mention stool. Im sure my organs are all blue now.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Yao

customer_reviews.title: 60% of the time works every time.
customer_reviews.text: While I cannot confirm that this contains pieces of real panther - it gives the the extra push I need to succeed.
customer_reviews.author: CIA Agent 35547

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor, and the boost. I almost never workout without it.
customer_reviews.author: AntDawg

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It works well for pre-workout energy and tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: The supplement to get high results
customer_reviews.text: If u like the jitters and craziness here u go
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than original formula, still gives you energy just not as much.
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than the original product, I don’t think it gives as much energy as the original either, but still does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Stormy

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: Definitely thought this was koolaid but apparently it’s like some sort of cocaine? Not sure what I did wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Everett

customer_reviews.title: Weaker than if I bought in other stor3s
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying the same exact product from other places but I bought this now on Amazon and it has way more blue die or something and is weaker than the other ones I bought.
customer_reviews.author: anthony powell

customer_reviews.title: Not buying again
customer_reviews.text: Dont feel much for long even whwn i take a scoop and a half. Also they dye in this product is rediculous. If you want to look like you blew a smurf get it.
customer_reviews.author: N.E.

product_meta.title: C4 Original Pre Workout Powder ICY Blue Razz | Vitamin C for Immune Support | Sugar Free Preworkout Energy for Men & Women | 150mg Caffeine + Beta Alanine + Creatine | 30 Servings
product_meta.description: Flavor:Icy Blue Razz| Size:30 ServingsIconic and essential, C4 Original is our foundational explosive pre-workout. Available in an amazing array of sugar-free flavors, C4 Original is built with a classic energy, endurance, pumps, and performance formula delivers 150mg of caffeine and is beneficial for lifters of all levels.
feature_bullets: Vitamin C for Immune Support - 417% of Daily Value Per Serving
